TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopeVersion extends System.Object

summary.span: 메시지 및 해당 교환과 연결된 SOAP 버전 관련 정보를 포함합니다.

span.span: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 현재 사용할 수 있는 SOAP 버전은 SOAP 1.1과 SOAP 1.2입니다.The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 및 속성을 사용하여 복구할 수 있는 이러한 각 SOAP 버전의 이 있습니다.There is an for each of these versions of SOAP that can be recovered using the and properties. SOAP 형식을 사용하지 않는 XML 메시지를 보내고 받는 데 사용되는 메시지 버전도 있습니다.There is also a message version that is used to sent and receive XML messages that do not use SOAP formatting. 각 메시지 버전과 연결된 처리 역할은 속성 및 메서드를 사용하여 복구할 수 있습니다.The processing roles associated with each message version can be recovered using the property and the method. ## Examples 다음 코드에서는 의 메서드 및 속성에 액세스하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code shows how to access the methods and properties of . [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetUltimateDestinationActorValues() cil managed

summary.span: 최종 대상의 현재 메시지 버전과 연결된 SOAP 역할의 URI 이름이 포함된 문자열을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.

returns.span: SOAP1.1이 사용될 경우 빈 문자열이며, SOAP1.2가 사용될 경우 http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver를 포함하는 문자열입니다.

span.span: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `null`을 지정한 경우 최종 수신자는 입니다.The ultimate receiver is `null` if is specified. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NextDestinationActorValue As String
public: property System::String ^ NextDestinationActorValue { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 다음 대상의 현재 메시지 버전과 연결된 SOAP 역할의 URI 이름이 포함된 문자열을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.

value.span: 포함 된 문자열 http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next SOAP1.1 사용 될 경우를 포함 하는 문자열 http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next SOAP1.2 사용 될 경우 및 메시지 버전 none 이면 빈 문자열입니다.

span.span: A string that contains http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next if SOAP1.2 is used; and an empty string if the message version is none.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ None { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: SOAP 버전을 사용하지 않는 봉투 버전을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.

value.span: SOAP 형식을 사용하지 않는 봉투 버전입니다.

span.span: The envelope version not using a SOAP formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메시지 버전을 사용하는 경우는 SOAP 봉투가 기록되지 않으며 메시지에서 본문 내용을 내보낸다는 것을 의미합니다.If the message version is used this means that a SOAP envelope is not written out and the message emits the contents of the body. 이 통해 xml 서식을 SOAP 사용 하 여 끝점과 통신 하도록 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 채널을 수 있습니다.This enables an Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) channel to communicate with an endpoint that is expecting XML with no SOAP formatting. XML 페이로드는 메시지 본문에 있으며, 인코더에 연결될 경우 XML 페이로드만 내보내집니다.The XML payload lives in the body of a message and is the only thing emitted when it hits the encoder. 마찬가지로 임의의 XML 청크가 수신되면 채널 스택까지 전파할 수 있도록 메시지에 포함됩니다.Similarly, when the arbitrary chunk of XML is received it is wrapped up in a Message for propagation up the channel stack. 필요한 헤더가 삽입되고 메시지가 SOAP 메시지처럼 처리됩니다.The required headers are inserted and the message is processed as if it had been a SOAP message. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#3)]

public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ Soap11 { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 자세한 내용은 참조에 대 한 스키마 [SOAP 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641)합니다.For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 자세한 내용은 참조에 대 한 스키마 [SOAP 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96642)합니다.For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96642). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 현재 봉투 버전을 나타내는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a string that represents the current envelope version.
The string representation of the current envelope version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 사람이 인식할 수 있는 문자열을 반환하며, 이 문자열은 문화권에 따라 다릅니다.This method returns a human-readable string that is culture-sensitive. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#6)]
